reviews.review_msg: Very helpful and approachable. Attendance is mandatory, but going to class is no chore. Very  interested in the course topic.

prof. Bidnall is clearly interested in her work, her lectures are well thought out and well done. you have to go to class to know enough. her finals and midterms are hard but if you study you should be ok

She's a good prof, and her lectures are interesting. But she doesn't use a text book or have lecture recordings so you have to go lecture in order to understand anything. Extremely hard on attendance, takes attendance during lecture! But very approachable.

Dr. Bidnall is really cool! She makes a very dry course content interesting by putting it in laymen's terms and relating it to modern events. It was a shame she doesnt teach her own tutorials, as my TA wasnt the best. I really enjoyed Dr. Bidnall as a prof and i look forward to taking more classes with her :)
Great Lecturer! Loves what shes teaching.

Amanda is a great prof with a real passion for History. Her lectures are interesting and engaging. She is extremely helpful and very approachable. Her lecture style makes class enjoyable for every one and course readings, for the most part , were interesting and worthwhile.

this woman does not understand what a 100 level course is - she reads off these large essays which she has prepared for each class. demonstrating her lack of ability and knowledge of the info to just lecture using powerpoint. literally tells you her arguments and reads her essays. readings are unrealistic - more than a 300 level course.
